subject: canadian see our Contact Us section Guadalupe
body:
Through want of enterprise and faith men are where they are, buying and selling and spending their lives like servants.

Exercise: you don't have time not to.

Presence is more than just being there.

Oh, how cruelly sweet are the echoes that start when memory plays an old tune on the heart!

I don't psyche myself up. I psyche myself down. I think clearer when I'm not psyched up.

When you put down the good things you ought to have done, and leave out the bad ones you did do -- well, that's Memoirs.

A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he knows something.

If you have to be in a soap opera try not to get the worst role.

To err is human, to forgive is divine.

People are changed, not by coercion or intimidation, but by example.

Diseases are the tax on pleasures.

Never confuse motion with action.

Viewing the child solely as an immature person is a way of escaping comforting him.
